items.title: Hazardous travel conditions expected in Colorado's mountains on Sunday

items.title: My family of 4 took a 7-hour train ride across Norway for $283. The incredible views weren't even the best part.

items.title: I'm a Travel Writer, and I Won't Get in an Uber Without This $10 Safety Device
items.content_text: As far as personal safety devices go, the Resqme Emergency Car Escape Tool provides peace of mind for those traveling in their own vehicle or on the road as a passenger. The must-have travel accessory allows you to cut your seatbelt or break a window if you're trapped in a vehicle, and it's $10 at Amazon.
